common.Name: Name
common.You can access customer personal details: You can access customer personal details and their activity history on the eCommerce portal including their viewed products and their ordered items. This provides valuable insights fortargeted marketing and understanding customer preferences and buying behaviour
common.You will be confirming Customer's order: You will be confirming Customer's order
common.You will be updating the Customer that t: You will be updating the Customer that the order is shipped
common.You will be updating the customer that t: You will be updating the customer that the order is getting delivered
common.AuditedBalanceSheetOfLast3years: Audited Balance Sheet of last 3 years
common.AtLeastOneNumberSymbolOrWhitespaceCharac: At least one number, symbol, or whitespace character
common.EnterTheCompanyNameAsRegisteredInGST/PAN: Enter the company/business name as registered in GST/PAN
common.CompleteYourCompanyDetails: Complete your company details to boost your credibility with customers. A comprehensive profile showcases your legitimacy, builds trust, and enhances your visibility in the marketplace.
common.EffortlesslyManageAndExpandYourOnlinePre: Effortlessly manage and expand your online presence. Add your social media handles in the vendor portal to connect with customers through multiple channels for further business growth.
common.CompleteYourTaxAndPayment: Complete your tax and payment details to facilitate seamless payouts. Your financial transparency and accuracy help streamline transactions and ensure timely disbursements.
common.CraftACompellingCompanyDescriptionToShow: Craft a compelling company description to showcase your brand's story and values. This personalized touch helps customers connect with your business, building trust and enhancing your brand's appeal.
common.AtWhichStockNumberPoint: At which stock number point, the Vendor has to get an intimation as it is out of stock. Example - 1.
common.MinimumQuantity: Minimum quantity that needs to be added to the cart for check out and placing order.
common.MaximumQuantity: Maximum quantity that needs to be added to the cart for check out and placing the order.
common.EnableBackOrders: Enable back orders for the ones for which the Customer has requested to get notified, when in stock.
common.ListOfTotalOrdersReceived: These are the list of total number of orders received so far on the eCommerce Portal.
common.ListOfOrdersReceivedToday: These are the list of orders received today and it will show only those orders that were received on today's date.
common.ListOfOrdersForWhichPaymentIsuccessful: These are the list of orders for which the payment process is successful.
common.WhenWritingYourProductDescription: When writing your product description, aim to provide a comprehensive overview of your item. Describe its features, benefits, and unique qualities in a way that resonates with potential buyers. Use clear and engaging language to captivate their interest and help them make informed purchasing decisions. Also, make sure to use a language that is easily readable and understandable.
common.IfSetThePriceWillReplace: If set, the price will replace the default price and the discount price provided will be shown to the Customers on the Storefront.
common.NoDiscountsOrSpecialPricesAddedYet: No Discounts or Special Prices Added Yet!
common.BoostYourSalesPotential: Boost your sales potential and revenue by offering discounts and special prices.Get started by creating irresistible offers.
common.ProvideTheStandardPrice: Provide the standard price for the product that is visible to the Customers on the Storefront by default.
common.Thisfeatureiscurrentlynotactiveforyou: This feature is currently not active for you
common.StartUploadingProductImages: Start uploading product images in the image library so that you can use whenever needed, both now and in the future
common.ChooseVideosFromYourSystem: Choose videos from your system, upload MP4 and WebM formats, or effortlessly embed YouTube videos. Showcase your products and engage customers effectively by providing a walkthrough experience.
common.StartUploadingProductVideos: Start uploading product videos that you can use whenever needed, both now and in the future. It ca either be an embedded YouTube Video or an MP4 format video in WebM format only.
common.ATemporaryPricingThatTakesPrecedence: A temporary pricing that takes precedence, striking out the default or discount price when given.
common.Start Adding exciting Coupons To Your Pr: Start Adding exciting Coupons To Your Products
common.DiscountPriceshouldbelessthanTotalPrice: Discount Price should be less than TotalPrice
common.SpecialPriceshouldbelessthanTotalPrice: Special Price should be less than TotalPrice
